name: Black Hawk Motel

reviews.title: Wisconsin Dells Family Vacation
reviews.text: We visit the Dells every year for the past 30 years / we may have missed about six years. We have always stayed at the Black Hawk Motel every one of those years. Brad, the son of the original owners, is just like family away from home. They keep the property and rooms in excellent condition. The cleaning staff is always polite and courteous and we never felt that we could not trust them in our rooms when we were not there. The cost of the room rental is extremely good since all you basically do is sleep there while visiting the water parks and the Dells area during the day. Their outdoor and indoor pool is always very clean. Parking outside your room is also a big advantage. Being a smoker and staying in a non smoking room is excellent because you can go right outside your door, sit on a chair and smoke and always come back into a nice smelling room. The location right off downtown Dells is always nice because you have that quiet, peaceful time without all the noise. Brad and his staff are wonderful people.

reviews.title: A trip back in time
reviews.text: My family and I had a few bad experiences here at the Black Hawk. We had to leave the motel in the middle of the night. I will not mention what occurred because the staff and owner of the motel were very nice. If he, the owner, works on resolving the issues...then the black hawk will again be a shining star. I stayed at this motel when I was a child. I wanted my kids to experience the Dells the way I did when I was a kid back in the 70s...no over crowded water parks...just a small mom and pop motel with a nice pool and diving board. Maybe in the future we will try and stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Typically I stay at the Hilton Garden Inn in the Dells (4 times last year), but this year the rates were just too high so I started researching other places to stay and found this on trip advisor. It was perfect. The location was walking distance to downtown, which we walked to every night. I saw an entirely new side of the Dells by being able to walk downtown for night entertainment and dinners. The room was very clean, the bed was comfy, and the room was spacious. We were there over the fourth and were able to get chairs and lay out at the pool a few days. It was never overly crowded and all the other guests were very respectful. The porch was a nice touch, and having a parking spot right outside of our room was really convenient. The staff was also very friendly. Our room was right outside of the ice machine so we were nervous about noise, but even with that and the guests staying up late on the porch we were not bothered with any loud noise. I was very happy with this spot and so was my boyfriend, we can both be picky about being comfy and having a clean place when we travel and we were quite pleased with it. Definitely we will be staying here when we drive up again soon.
reviews.title: Clean, comfy, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This place was AMAZING!!!!!!! We originally booked a night here before going to another resort just because it was inexpensive and we were on a budget. Whoa, what a surprise!!! Our room was one of the nicest I have been in in a long time. It was perfectly clean and newly remodeled. There are lawn chairs on the front "porch". It felt like home. There is a place to BBQ, indoor and outdoor pools, game room, and a sauna. The people working (I think they were the owners) were so nice and helpful! I wish we would have stayed here the entire time and not went to another resort.
reviews.title: Felt Like Home

reviews.text: This place is located past the heart of the Dells, but close enough to walk to everything. We stayed in a double queen bed the first night. It is non smoking there, but everyone was smoking outside which made its way inside. We moved across the street for the rest of our trip. It was much better here. The room was great for a family of 4. It was very clean and the service was great. Very friendly people that run the place. Would definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Great place to stay in the Dells.

reviews.text: The first night we stayed at a regular room and the room smelled like cigarettes the second room was very nice. The service was very nice and managers for always there to help us. The motel was very close to all the Attractions and It was very nice. The pool had slides and a diving board.it was pretty busy but I would suggest having Gym or a breakfast because all they have a coffee so I think I should have more options.good job Blackhawk I had a very nice stay.
reviews.title: The black hawk was a nice and great motel.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Normally I like to stay in the big resorts but the cost of $200+ a night. That did not happen because of the holiday weekend everything was extremely expensive. I checked travel advisory and AAA this hotel had great reviews. We arrived late on the 4th of July to our surprise there was assigned parking directly in front of your door, no looking for a place to park A+. The staff was very friendly when we arrived they gave everything that was mention without us even asking for it? OMG, room 47 was extremely clean & big, it was directly across from the pool. We had a king size bed, the bathroom was up to date granite counter tops with mahogany cabinets to match. Granite top in room as well, flat screen TV & a small dinette set. The room did have a refrigerator and a microwave. The towels were soft, the bed was comfortable the pictures DOES NOT do this motel justice. It located 3 short blocks from downtown Super A+ there's a back street if you have to drive that will help you avoid the downtown traffic its to the left of the hotel if existing. A taste of New Orleans is only 3 short blocks from the motel great food. HERE'S a super plus after the guest checked out they actual wash the quilts and line dry them. That made my day. I walked around the room in white sock every night the bottom were still white. The bed sits on carpet the rest of the room is ceramic tile. This was our first trip to the Dells, the money I saved by staying at Black Hawk Motel we spent on nice dinners, and sight seeing.. The only downside was we drove in from Chicago MDW the toll were excessive and expensive the speed limit was 55 mph. There's a lot of road work in Chicago so the speed limit drop to 45 mph next time I will fly into MADISON WISCONSIN. One more + the lounge chair that sit I front of your room nice touch great for enjoying the evening breeze. We stayed7/4/13 to 7/8/13
reviews.title: Best hotel great location
Family and budget friendly!!
reviews.text: Loved this place! Already planning our next trip back! Pools were great and fun for all ages! Very well maintained!!! We had such a great experience-my only suggestion would be more hooks in the rooms. (It was that great!!)

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.text: This place is great (just like all the other reviewers are saying). We had a double queen room that was close to the office. The beds were comfortable, the overall atmosphere was great, great location. My kids loved that the indoor pool and arcade was open until 11:30 pm and the outdoor pool until 10. it was a great place to end the day after all the tourist activities we did during the day. The retro look of the motel was neat. Normally when I think of retro, I expect it to be old as well. This place has been kept in great shape though. We will be back!

reviews.title: Excellent Experience
reviews.text: Myself, wife, and 2 children (6 and 7) stayed here for 1 night from Indiana for our first visit to the Dells and would never stay anywhere else. The room was perfect, a good location, clean, comfortable, and really affordable. Our plans changed last minute and we added the 7 year old (friends kid). The staff was more than helpful when we called early after driving up there in the middle of the night and arriving in the morning. They adjusted our room to suit our needs, and found a room for us to check into early.

reviews.title: Great Value...Great Hotel
reviews.text: I have been bringing my family to the Dells for years and wish I would have looked into the Blackhawk sooner. The rooms are very clean we enjoyed both pools and the game room. The hotel is just a short walk from the downtown area and also has two excellent restaurants nearby. They also offer FREE passes to Chula Vista's water parks which my children had a ball at,I have been to the other water parks in years past but this one sure beats being packed in like sardines and waiting forever to go down a slide. Anyone who is looking for a GREAT hotel and a good time on a budget and is not looking to overpay should check out the Blackhawk!

reviews.title: Great little jem -- fantastic value
reviews.text: We stayed here 07/06 - 07/08 with my husband and 7 year old. We were in Room 44.

description: Sealy Encore Plush Beds in all rooms! Choose from 30 different room types, from family to budget, cottages, jacuzzi suites, kitchenettes and two bedroom units. All rooms include Free High Speed Wireless, Fridge, Microwave, DVD/CD player and Reserved parking at your door. Indoor and Outdoor Heated Pools with slides and diving board. Centerally located just 4 blocks from downtown, attraction packages, 24 hour casino shuttle. Family Owned and Operated Since 1945!
